pageContext.claim: “To prevent the omnibus situation from ever happening again, I’m calling on Congress to give me a line-item veto for all government spending bills.”
pageContext.analysis: The Supreme Court has ruled the line-item veto unconstitutional, so Congress does not have the power to fulfill Trump's request. Legal experts say Congress might be able to give the president the ability to propose line-item vetoes. But that's not the same thing.
